description.narrative: Key actors in decentralization and public finance reforms have increased capacities in programme budgeting, social accountability and advocacy to allocate more resources to social sectors and child-focused services., which contributes to Evaluation, Reducing Child Poverty, Research. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: The most marginalized children, adolescents and young people benefit from evidence-based social and economic policies and social protection programmes that address multidimensional poverty and advance the equitable realization of their rights.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Key actors in decentralization and public finance reforms have increased capacities in programme budgeting, social accountabilityand advocacy to allocate more resources to social sectors and child-focused services.

description.narrative: Les élections municipales ont vu le renouvellement de près de 80% des élus locaux mais seulement 14 femmes élues sur un total de 255 maires et un peu moins de 30% de femmes élues pour les scrutins municipaux et législatifs. Le programme pilote sur la gouvernance locale dans 13 communes contribue à institutionnaliser les cadres de dialogue et de redevabilité entre jeunes et autorités, favorisant la participation des jeunes et la mobilisation communautaire en faveur des services sociaux de base dans les communes. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:27/12/2021
